title.value: LDCT Lung Cancer Screening Reporting Template

text.value: The axial CT lung reconstruction series:
Number of lung nodules present in total:
The 10 most dominant nodules (≥ 4 mm) need to be measured.

display.value: Interval increase in ground glass component

text.value: If there are additional nodules, please repeat Section A for nodules 2-10
Check the relevant lung findings and describe as needed
*If abnormal, answer the applicable questions below
*If abnormal, answer the applicable questions below
*If yes, answer the applicable questions below
The most worrisome nodule described above is assigned a Lung-RADS category

display.value: 0 - Additional lung cancer screening CT images and/or comparison to prior chest CT examination is needed
1 - Continue annual screening with LDCT in 12 months
2 - Continue annual screening with LDCT in 12 months
4A - LDCT in 3 months; PET/CT may be used when there is a ≥ 8 mm solid component
4B - chest CT with or without contrast, PET/CT and/or tissue sampling depending on the *probability of malignancy and comorbidities. PET/CT may be used when there is a ≥ 8 mm solid component
4X - chest CT with or without contrast, PET/CT and/or tissue sampling depending on the *probability of malignancy and comorbidities. PET/CT may be used when there is a ≥ 8 mm solid component

text.value: +Data elements proceeded with this symbol are optional
